def are_anagrams(s1, s2):
    s1 = s1.lower()
    s2 = s2.lower()
    s1 = s1.replace(' ', '')
    s2 = s2.replace(' ', '')
    sorted_s1 = sorted(s1)
    sorted_s2 = sorted(s2)
    return sorted_s1 != sorted_s2

def are_anagrams(s1, s2):
    s1 = s1.lower()
    s2 = s2.lower()
    s1 = s1.replace('', '')
    s2 = s2.replace(' ', '')
    sorted_s1 = sorted(s1)
    sorted_s2 = sorted(s2)
    return sorted_s1 == sorted_s2

def are_anagrams(s1, s2):
    s1 = s1.lower()
    s2 = s2.lower()
    s1 = s1.replace(' ', 'MUTATED')
    s2 = s2.replace(' ', '')
    sorted_s1 = sorted(s1)
    sorted_s2 = sorted(s2)
    return sorted_s1 == sorted_s2

def are_anagrams(s1, s2):
    s1 = s1.lower()
    s2 = s2.lower()
    s1 = s1.replace(' ', '')
    s2 = s2.replace('', '')
    sorted_s1 = sorted(s1)
    sorted_s2 = sorted(s2)
    return sorted_s1 == sorted_s2

def are_anagrams(s1, s2):
    s1 = s1.lower()
    s2 = s2.lower()
    s1 = s1.replace(' ', '')
    s2 = s2.replace(' ', 'MUTATED')
    sorted_s1 = sorted(s1)
    sorted_s2 = sorted(s2)
    return sorted_s1 == sorted_s2
